DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial test impact patient-navigated , anti-inflammatory , culinary-based intervention ( reinforced motivational interview [ MI ] tailor newsletter ) obese ( body mass index [ BMI ] 30+ ) , early-stage ( 0-IIIA ) breast cancer survivor compare control group .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator recruit English-speaking , early-stage breast cancer survivor ( N=200 ) two-arm randomize control trial ( RCT ) involve 2 ( group ) 3 ( time ) repeat measure design . The intervention stimulate dietary behavior change use individualized anti-inflammatory dietary prescription six monthly workshop ( culinary demonstration , recipe meal plan ) behavior change cure reinforce evidence- theory-based patient navigation , motivational interviewing , tailor newsletter personalize individual readiness change . Control participant receive minimal nutritional information baseline , monthly American Cancer Society survivorship brochure , two telephone call prior assessment appointment . Groups compare baseline 6- 12-month follow-up . Dependent measure include dietary behavior level cancer-associated biomarkers .
DOC.criteria: Females 18 year old Primary diagnosis breast cancer Fluency English B.M.I . > = 30 Available followup 12 month Clinical evidence metastatic disease Not diagnose primary breast cancer Lack fluency English B.M.I . < 30
